Test Name: Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR) Screen with Reflex to Titer
Purpose: Screening for syphilis by detecting non-treponemal antibodies; reactive samples are titrated to quantify antibody levels.
Container: Serum collection tube (container not explicitly specified in SOP)
Equipment: RPR card test kit, mechanical rotator, pipettes with tips, test cards/slides, disposable stirrers, timer, microscope
